text: Fernando Hoyos (born 21 June 1921) is a Colombian former sports shooter. He competed in the 50 metre pistol event at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Colombian male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Colombia Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Tolima Department
title: Fernando Hoyos
